57  struct EXIV2API GroupInfo {
58  struct GroupName;
59  bool operator==(int ifdId) const;
60  bool operator==(const GroupName& groupName) const;
61  int ifdId_;
62  const char* ifdName_;
63  const char* groupName_;
64  TagListFct tagList_;
65  };

68  struct EXIV2API GroupInfo::GroupName {
69  explicit GroupName(const std::string& groupName);
70  std::string g_;
71  };

74  struct EXIV2API TagInfo {
76  TagInfo(
77  uint16_t tag,
78  const char* name,
79  const char* title,
80  const char* desc,
81  int ifdId,
82  int sectionId,
83  TypeId typeId,
84  int16_t count,
85  PrintFct printFct
86  );
87  uint16_t tag_;
88  const char* name_;
89  const char* title_;
90  const char* desc_;
91  int ifdId_;
92  int sectionId_;
93  TypeId typeId_;
94  int16_t count_;
95  PrintFct printFct_;
96  }; // struct TagInfo
